My works

A quick glance at what I've done

Pretendo

  • NodeJS
  • Golang
  • Python

Custom game server replacements for Nintendo Network on the WiiU and 3DS

Pinder

Mobile app for finding adoptable pets around you

Disney+ API

Frontend client for the WiiU emulator, Cemu

BCSV

    Documentation of the BCSV file format used on the Nintendo Switch. Reverse engineered from Animal Crossing: New Horizons

    • Python

    Database and scraper for anime episode opening and ending timestamps using acoustic fingerprinting
